@/02-example.description: Patch to demonstrate hiding axes. After 2 seconds of runtime the axes will be hidden. After a further 2 seconds the axes will return.

rkSelDqib5.description: Index of bar (first bar is indexed as 1).
rkSelDqib5.label: Index

@/change-width.description: Change the width of the bar identified by Index. See patch: 05-example.

@/group-bars.description: Display bars in groups of size Num.

Hkmw2d5jbq.description: Index of bar (first bar is indexed as 1).
Hkmw2d5jbq.label: Index

@/delete-bar.description: Delete bar identified by Index. See patch: 04-example.

SkXh5zijb5.description: Index of bar (first bar is indexed as 1).
SkXh5zijb5.label: Index

@/hide-label.description: Hide the label of the bar identified by Index. See patch: 05-example.

SJrEyZrjW5.description: Index of bar (first bar is indexed as 1).
SJrEyZrjW5.label: Index

@/change-param.description: Change parameters. Modify the Label, Value and Color of a bar identified by Index. See patch: 05-example.

Hyadd2oZc.description: Scaling factor for reducing size of bar-chart.
Hyadd2oZc.label: Scale

@/reduce-size.description: Reduce size of bar-chart. See patch: 03-example.

S1BP1Dio-5.description: Size of label text. Text size multiplier (takes values from 01h to 07h).
S1BP1Dio-5.label: Lsize

HyYWhjib9.description: Size of text used to display value of bar. Text size multiplier (takes values from 01h to 07h).
HyYWhjib9.label: Vsize

@/set-text-size-color.description: Set the size and color of the text used for labels. Additionally, set the background color of the display. See patch: 07-example.

BkStsm-z9.label: Show
BkStsm-z9.description: If true, show axes. If false, hide axes.

@/show-axes.description: Show axes of bar-chart. See patch: 02-example.

r1LXeYqW5.description: Index of bar (first bar is indexed as 1).
r1LXeYqW5.label: Index

SyDFJgnZ9.description: Plot a line chart over a grouped bar-chart.

@/show-line-chart-group.description: Overlay line chart for grouped data. See patch: 06-example.

@/03-example.description: Patch to demonstrate shrinking the bar-chart. The bar-chart is initially shown full size, but after 2 seconds it is shrunk to quarter size.

@/04-example.description: Patch to demonstrate deleting bars from bar-chart. Initially six bars are shown. After two seconds, the 2nd and 5th bars are deleted.

@/05-example.description: Patch to demonstrate changing the appearance of a bar.

@/06-example.description: Line charts with non-grouped and grouped bars.

SkeH51HMc.content: # Change text size and colour. Also change background colour of bar chart.

@/07-example.description: Patch to demonstrate changing: (1) text size, (2) text foreground colour, (3) text background colour, and (4) bar-chart background colour.

description: Nodes for drawing bar charts on the LCD screen of the Wio Terminal. Wraps https://github.com/Seeed-Studio/Seeed_Arduino_Histogram
name: wio-terminal-bar-chart
